name: AppDNA User Story MCP
description: MCP server for interacting with AppDNA user stories

tools.name: create_user_story
tools.description: Creates a user story and validates its format

title.description: Title or ID for the user story (optional)

description.description:
The user story text following one of these formats:
1. A [Role name] wants to [View all, view, add, update, delete] a [object name]
2. As a [Role name], I want to [View all, view, add, update, delete] a [object name]

tools.name: secret_word_of_the_day
tools.description: Get the secret word of the day, uniquely generated for this MCP server and project
